topics.title: Rosenport Project Introduction and Team
topics.summary: Introduction to Rosenport, a cross-chain bridging project with lower fees for smaller funds. Built by team members Sangi24, Key888, and Hammerman.

topics.title: Blockchain Interoperability and Rosen Bridge Context
topics.summary: Discussion of blockchain ecosystem growth and interoperability needs. Overview of Rosen Bridge as the foundation for Ergo cross-chain functionality.

topics.title: Rosen Bridge Fee Structure Problems
topics.summary: Explanation of current Rosen Bridge fee issues, including $10 minimum fee for transactions under $2,000 and 0.5% fee for larger amounts. These high fees create barriers for smaller fund transfers.

topics.title: Rosenport Batch Bridging Solution Overview
topics.summary: Detailed explanation of Rosenport's batch bridging approach to solve fee problems. Users can contribute smaller amounts that are batched together to reach the $2,000 threshold for better fees.

topics.title: Development Status and Technical Architecture
topics.summary: Current development progress including Figma designs, collaboration with Rosen team on SDK development, and implementation of multi-chain payments and database systems.

topics.title: UI Demo and User Experience Walkthrough
topics.summary: Comprehensive demo of Rosenport interface showing bridge process from Ergo to Bitcoin network. Demonstrates batch status tracking, transaction history, and withdrawal options with no claiming required.

topics.title: Release Timeline and Future Development Plans
topics.summary: Timeline for public testing in mid-July and full release by end of July. Plans to implement all future Rosen Bridge network additions and continuous UI improvements based on user feedback.
